descriptionNullable:
**Motivation**:
I have to count all the chickens every day to check if they are all in the hencoop. As it's hard to count them in the nest, I decided to count them using CV. I will be placing the camera above the door, thus most of the photos are taken from an overhead angle.

You can find the annotation file, named `_annotations.coco.json`, in the train folder.

I did not split the dataset here and the annotation format is COCO, but you can find the other versions and formats here:
[https://universe.roboflow.com/training-kuvo9/chicken-counter](https://universe.roboflow.com/training-kuvo9/chicken-counter)

**Dataset**:
Size: 375
Image shape: 640x640x3
Annotation format: COCO (JSON)
title: Chicken Object Detection/Segmentation
subtitle: Dataset for chicken counter project
